item.Q:

traditional: 擬
nǐ

traditional: 李鴻章
LǐHóngzhāng Li Hung-chang or Li Hongzhang (1823-1901), Qing dynasty general, politician and diplomat
bùmiào (of a turn of events) not too encouraging; far from good; anything but reassuring
qímiào fantastic; wonderful
qiǎomiào ingenious; clever
wēimiào subtle
jīngmiào to be exquisite

traditional: 絕妙
juémiào exquisite
měimiào beautiful; wonderful; splendid
mòmíngqímiào odd; baffling; unaccountable; mysterious; boring (e.g. movie)

traditional: 分辯
fēnbiàn exculpate

traditional: 爭辯
zhēngbiàn (n) disputation; (vi) wrangle

traditional: 申辯
shēnbàn averment

traditional: 答辯
dábiàn to reply (to an accusation)

traditional: 辯解
biànjiě to explain; to justify; to defend (a point of view etc); to provide an explanation; to try to defend oneself

traditional: 辯論
biànlùn debate; argue over

traditional: 辯護
biànhù speak in defense of; argue in favor of; defend; plead; defend

traditional: 辯護人
bànhùrén defender

traditional: 雄辯
xióngbiàn eloquent
méirén go-between; matchmaker
méijiè media; medium

traditional: 媒質

traditional: 觸媒

chǎozuǐ (v) quarrel

traditional: 爭吵
zhēngchǎo dispute; strife

traditional: 擬定
nǐdìng to draw up; to draft

traditional: 擬訂
nǐdìng to draw up (a plan)

traditional: 擬議
nǐyì proposal; recommendation; to draft

traditional: 模擬器
mónǐqì emulator

traditional: 比擬
bǐnǐ compare; draw a parallel; match; analogy; metaphor; comparison

traditional: 草擬
cǎonǐ first draft; to draw up (a first version)

traditional: 久違
jiǔwéi (haven't done sth) for a long time

traditional: 事與願違
shìyǔyuànwéi things don't turn out the way you want or plan

traditional: 違例
wéilì to break the rules

traditional: 違反
wéifǎn to violate (a law)

traditional: 違憲

traditional: 違抗

traditional: 違法

traditional: 違犯
wéifàn to violate; to infringe

traditional: 違章

traditional: 違背
wéibèi to violate; to be contrary to

traditional: 後顧之憂
hòugùzhīyōu (set phrase) disturbance in the rear, trouble back home, family worries

traditional: 憂傷
yōushāng (adj) distressed; sad; worried; grieved

traditional: 憂愁
yōuchóu to be worried

traditional: 憂慮
yōulǜ to worry; anxiety (about)

traditional: 擔憂
dānyōu to worry; to be concerned
bāxiānzhuō old fashioned square table to seat eight people

traditional: 圓桌
yuánzhuō roundtable
zhuōzi table; desk
zhuōmiàn desktop; tabletop

traditional: 飯桌
fànzhuō dining table
pīnmìng doing one's utmost; with all one's might; at all costs; (working or fighting) as if one's life depends on it
pīnyīn phonetic writing; pinyin (Chinese romanization)
pīnyīnwénzì phonetic alphabet; alphabetic writing system

traditional: 供銷
gōngxiāo (v) supply and sell

traditional: 包銷
bāoxiāo have exclusive selling rights; be the sole agent for a production unit or firm
